Subject: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

::Bazooka::

    "Internal Repairs complete." A computer voice said. Bazooka awoke from 
Stasis Lock. He transformed into Beast Mode and started to wonder around. I 
must find a base. He thought to himself. Unfortuantly he didn't remember much 
of his programming. He didn't remember how to transform into robot mode 
anymore. He started walking around and something triggered a deep hatred. He 
remembered the bot known as Quickstrike and his mad persuit. Soon he rembered 
that he had been blasted by Autoguns somewhere. That was all he could 
remember. He wandered for hours like this just looking at his surroundings. 
He became quite acuanted with the world in these hours.
    After many hours he came across a base, he tried to remember if he had 
ever been there before but he couldn't remember. He walked in. Memories came 
flooding back. Yes he had been here before. He remembered. 
    "I am a Predacon." Bazooka said to himself. "Bazooka Terrorize" Now in 
his familiar robot mode he wandered the halls. He came across the Mighty 
Megatron.
    "Do you still wish for me to attack the Ark?" He asked.
